product_name: Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A cross between mid layer and shell, the women's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Hoodie lets you move uninterrupted, shedding spindrift and wind from base to summit and back. A truly technical fleece for alpine or rock climbing with a trim design. Durable Polartec(R) Wind Pro(R) fabric that's 90% polyester (50% of which is recycled) and 10% spandex forms the elbows, chest, shoulders, top of hood and upper-back. Hardface(R) technology and a durable water repellent finish protects your front torso and elbows from wind, moisture and abrasion. Back and side panels are super breathable, stretchy and wicking Polartec Power Dry(R) fabric that's 94% polyester (54% of which is recycled) and 6% spandex. Warm, brushed-fleece interior moves moisture quickly to the fabric face. Stretchy, snug-fitting balaclava-style hood. Microfleece at back of neck, chin guard, cuffs and hem. Zippered handwarmer pockets and chest pocket. Women's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Hoodie has seamless shoulders for pack-wearing comfort. Closeout.
short_description: A cross between mid layer and shell, the women's Patagonia Piton Hybrid Fleece Hoodie lets you move uninterrupted, shedding spindrift and wind from base to summit and back.
